title: Study finds why people aren't upgrading to iOS 26
description: According to a new survey conducted by SellCell on 2,000 US-based adult iPhone users this month, 22% haven't upgraded to iOS 26 yet, despite it being available since September. The main reason is not knowing about it, followed by thinking the iPhone would update automatically. Battery life getting worse is also a reason, followed by people simply not wanting the new Liquid Glass design. People are also concerned about their iPhone getting slower after the update. 61% of users don't update right away, most of them waiting a bit to see if there are any huge issues reported. There are...

title: Redmi Turbo 5 key specs confirmed ahead of launch
description: The Redmi Turbo 5 series is scheduled to launch in China tomorrow. Ahead of the launch, Redmi has been teasing several details about the lineup. After recently confirming key specs of the Turbo 5 Max, the brand has now revealed details about the standard Turbo 5. In a series of Weibo posts, Redmi has confirmed that the Turbo 5 will be powered by the Dimensity 8500-Ultra chipset. It will be paired with LPDDR5X Ultra RAM and UFS 4.1 storage. The phone will also get a 3D ice-sealed vapor chamber setup that is said to improve heat dissipation. Redmi has also revealed the display and...

title: Galaxy A07 5G debuts with 6,000mAh battery, 120Hz display
description: Samsung’s new A-series phone, the Galaxy A07 5G is officially unveiled in the Philippines and is available for purchase. It was recently listed on the official Samsung website in Myanmar as well. The Galaxy A07 5G is equipped with a 6nm octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC. In the Philippines, the phone gets 4GB of RAM and up to 128GB storage. It also sports a microSD card slot for storage expansion. It comes with a 6.7-inch LCD with a refresh rate of 120Hz, 800 nits HBM brightness, and an HD+ resolution. At the back, the Galaxy A07 5G gets a dual camera setup with a 50MP main...

title: Huawei Watch GT 6 Pro now has a golf-themed Honma edition
description: Huawei launched the Watch GT 6 Pro in September, and today there's a new version of it coming out in Malaysia. It's called the Honma x Huawei Watch GT 6 Pro, and it's priced at MYR 1,299 or $328. If you buy one, you'll receive it in a premium gift box. Honma x Huawei Watch GT 6 Pro The Honma edition obviously comes with Honma themes, as well as golf-specific features, including an AI caddie, play-like distance, and green slope direction. That's because Honma is a Japanese company famous for making hand-crafted golf clubs and equipment. Otherwise, this is a 'normal' 46mm...

title: Realme P4 Power unboxing
description: This is the Realme P4 Power, and we're lucky enough to have it a few days before its January 29 unveiling. So, let's unbox it. The Realme P4 Power ships with a case, a USB-C to USB-A cable, and an 80W SuperVOOC charger. The phone is coming to the Indian market first. What's special about the Realme P4 Power is the fact that it's packed with a 10,001mAh battery inside a rather normal-looking body. Even better, the phone doesn't feel even remotely overweight. It's not as thin as the currently-trendy Edge, Slim, Air, etc. phones out there, but it's more practical than them,...

title: Samsung plans to sell a million units of its new wider foldable phone
description: Samsung only recently officially announced its tri-fold called the Galaxy Z TriFold and even sold some units in South Korea. But later this year, the company is expected to launch yet another foldable phone, rumored to arrive alongside the Galaxy Z Fold8 and Z Flip8 this summer. According to supply chain sources, Samsung is planning to sell at least 1 million units of the called Galaxy Wide Fold, or at least that's the tentative name. The Wide Fold will feature a 4:3 foldable display in an attempt to rival the upcoming iPhone Fold, which is also rumored to have a 4:3 foldable...

title: More Moto G77 and Moto G67 renders leak, showing all colors
description: Last week, a Greek retailer posted a shot each of the upcoming Moto G77 and G67, and today a new leak brings us more renders of these two devices, from more angles, and showing two colorways for each of them. According to the source of these images, these are all of the hues in which these devices will be offered. The Moto G77 comes in Pantone Black Olive and Pantone Shaded Spruce. Moto G77 leaked renders The Moto G77 allegedly has a 6.8-inch AMOLED screen with "1.5K" resolution, a 120Hz refresh rate, and Gorilla Glass 7i on top, the MediaTek Dimensity 6400 SoC at the...

title: vivo X200T first impressions
description: Yesterday vivo introduced the vivo X200T as the newest member of its X200 series. The smartphone is "engineered for travel and real-world photography," and it will go on sale in India starting February 3 in two colors - Seaside Lilac and Stellar Black. We spent some time with the Seaside Lilac model, and here are our first impressions of the smartphone. [#InlinePriceWidget,14366,1#] The vivo X200T comes in a retail box identical to the X200, X200 Pro, and X200 FE. It includes a charging cable, a SIM ejector, some documents, a 90W power adapter, and a high-quality protective case...

title: Samsung confirms one of the Galaxy S26 Ultra's most leaked features
description: Today Samsung is announcing "a new layer of privacy" coming soon "to keep everyday moments truly yours". See if the following quote from the official press release sounds familiar: "Samsung will soon unveil a new layer of privacy to shield your phone from shoulder surfing wherever you go. You’ll have the space to check your messages or enter a password on public transit without thinking twice about who might be watching". That's right, Samsung has basically just confirmed the Galaxy S26 Ultra's oft-leaked privacy screen feature. This will be incredibly customizable. The company says you...

title: Moto G17, Moto G77, and Motorola Edge 70 Fusion prices leak
description: Thanks to a retailer listing in Italy, we now have purported pricing for the upcoming Moto G17, Moto G77, and Motorola Edge 70 Fusion. The G17 with 8GB of RAM and 256GB of storage is listed for €294.90. The G77 with 8GB of RAM and 256GB of storage is listed at €376.89, and the Edge 70 Fusion with the same RAM/storage amount as the other two will apparently go for €478.90. Moto G17, G77, and Edge 70 Fusion listings These aren't nicely rounded prices, the sort that device makers like for their recommended pricing, so they may not be 100% accurate. Hopefully the ballpark they...

title: Galaxy S26 Ultra could get a long-awaited display upgrade
description: There’s already been plenty of chatter around the Galaxy S26 Ultra’s display. It’s tipped to sport a 6.89-inch M14 OLED panel, deliver increased brightness, and use tougher glass. Now, a fresh leak reveals another long-awaited display upgrade. According to well-known tipster Ice Universe, the Galaxy S26 Ultra is confirmed to feature a 10-bit display panel. This would mark an upgrade over the 8-bit panel currently used on the Galaxy S25 Ultra. If the rumor is accurate, which it likely is, users can expect richer colors, smoother gradients, and improved HDR performance. While an...

title: Apple said to showcase Gemini-powered Siri next month
description: Earlier this month, it was revealed that Apple had selected Google’s Gemini models to power a new version of Siri. Now, a fresh report suggests the company could showcase the revamped assistant as early as next month. According to Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman, Apple is set to unveil the results of its Gemini partnership in February, most likely in the second half of the month. The company is expected to demo Siri’s new capabilities during an event or media briefing. Gurman notes that the new assistant, expected to be unveiled next month, will be capable of using personal data and...

title: Here’s how much the Galaxy Z TriFold will cost in the US
description: Samsung is all set to begin the Galaxy Z TriFold’s US expansion this week as the device is set to go on open sale from Friday, January 30. Samsung confirmed that the trifold will be available exclusively through Samsung.com and select Samsung Experience Stores for an eye-watering price of $2,899. That would crown the dual-folding Galaxy as the most expensive new smartphone in the US. Those willing to dish out the hefty price can get the Z TriFold in Crafted Black with 16GB RAM and 512GB storage. Galaxy Z TriFold was announced back in early December and went on sale in South Korea...

title: Google Photos now lets you use text prompts to turn your images into videos
description: Today Google has announced what it's calling "a major update" to the Photo to video feature in Google Photos. You now get "more creative control" to turn your images into "dynamic short videos". That's because you can now use text prompts for video generation, provided you are over 18. You can type a custom text prompt to describe the movement, style, or effect you want, and easily edit and refine your prompts to fine-tune the resulting video. If you don't know what to ask for, you still get the existing Subtle Movement and I'm feeling lucky options that were there...

title: Oppo starts teasing the K14x in India
description: Oppo has started teasing a new K-series device that's coming soon to the Indian market, by releasing the image you can see below. The phone will be sold by Flipkart, and the retailer's URL for its teaser reveals that the handset in question is actually the K14x. This will pretty obviously be the successor to the K13x, which Oppo launched back in June of 2025. Unfortunately, at this time Oppo hasn't revealed any further details about the K14x, but surely some of the specs will be teased in the coming days, so stay tuned. [#InlinePriceWidget,13978,1#] Source

title: Moto G17 leaks in renders showing three colors
description: Yesterday the upcoming Moto G17 had its memory and storage amounts leaked, and it was confirmed to be on the way by Motorola's own website. Today some leaked renders show us the G17 in three colors: Alaskan Blue, Evening Blue, and pink. Moto G17 in Alaskan Blue The G17 allegedly measures 165.67 x 75.98 x 8.17 mm. Thus, it's identical in size to its predecessor, the G15, which was released in February of 2025. Given that, it may very well have the same 6.72-inch screen size too. Moto G17 in Evening Blue The Moto G17 will be offered with 8GB of RAM and 256GB...

title: Nothing's flagship India store will open on February 14
description: Nothing has revealed the date for its first flagship store in India. Located in the South Indian city of Bengaluru, the store will open on Saturday, February 14. The company first announced plans for its store opening a couple of weeks ago. The India store will be Nothing's second flagship store, after the first one that opened in London back in 2022. While Nothing hasn't mentioned the exact location of the store, locals have already spotted it on the 100 Feet Road in Indiranagar, incidentally right next to a Xiaomi store. The store looks to be in the final stages of being...

title: iPhone 5s and iPhone 6 are receiving a new iOS update
description: Apple recently rolled out the iOS 26.2.1 and iPadOS 26.2.1 updates for its latest devices. However, the company also pushed a surprise update to several older models, including the 13-year-old iPhone 5s and the 12-year-old iPhone 6. iOS 12.5.8 and iPadOS 12.5.8 have been rolled out by Apple for several older devices. Users with an iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPad Air, iPad mini 2/mini 3, or an iPod touch (6th gen) are recommended to install the new update. The update doesn’t bring any new features, but it extends the certifications required to run iMessage, FaceTime, and...

title: Nothing Phone (4a) Pro battery and charging details emerge in latest certification
description: Nothing's Phone 4a series is set to launch soon and ahead of its unveiling, the Phone 4a Pro emerged in a certification listing on the EU’s EPREL database. The device appeared with the same A069P model number as previous listings, and we get confirmation of its 5,080mAh battery with 50W charging. Nothing Phone (4a) Pro's EPREL certification The listing also confirms a battery endurance per cycle rating of 63h 24min. The battery is rated to withstand 1,400 charge cycles before it gets below 80% of its initial capacity. Phone (4a) Pro also features IP65 ingress protection and...

title: Huawei nova 14i debuts in Hong Kong
description: Following its announcement over three months ago, Huawei’s nova 14i has made its way to Hong Kong and we finally have pricing details to go with it. The device will be available from February 6 and will retail for HKD 1,588 ($203) in its 8/256GB storage trim. Nova 14i is available in blue and black colors and is actually a rebadged version of the Huawei Enjoy 60X aka Nova Y91 both of which launched back in 2023. Huawei nova 14i The device comes with a 6.95-inch LCD (FHD+120Hz), a Snapdragon 680 chipset and a 7,000mAh battery with 22.5W charging. The circular camera island...
